query: Fairfield Harvest Rush gravel race Fairfield

videos.title: Gabe Hobbie
videos.description: In this episode of the Iowa Gravel Series Podium Podcast, Chris McQueen interviews Gabe Hobbie, who took second place in the 100k at the Fairfield Harvest Rush in 2024. Hobbie discusses his background in cycling, including his experience mountain biking in South Dakota and his transition to gravel biking in Iowa.  He also discusses his training and nutrition strategies, as well as his goals for the future.  McQueen and Hobbie also talk about the challenges of balancing work and life with cycling, and the importance of staying motivated after an injury.
